links.quickAbout: Hi, I'm Lucas! Here you can find links to all my content.

home.clarkeQuote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic
home.softwareEngineer: I'm a software engineer with a passion for impactful technology and building
home.whenNotCoding: When not coding, I'll probably be spending time with my fianc√©e and our pets, cooking, reading, or enjoying some time in nature. üçÇ
home.aboutWriting: In this page, you'll find some of my thoughts and projects. I divide my writing into two: ideas and bytes. Ideas are longer, more thought-out pieces, while bytes are shorter and more frequent.

devNaGringa.title: Dev na Gringa
devNaGringa.description: A newsletter for brazilian engineers who wants to grow their careers and work for international companies.

emojinx.title: emojinx
emojinx.description: A multiplayer memory matching game. Features real-time gameplay and timed turns.
emojinx.expandedContent: Made with React, TypeScript and Convex (WebSockets).

mockinvoice.title: mockinvoice
mockinvoice.description: I work daily with invoices, and was tired to create a fake invoice every now and then.
mockinvoice.expandedContent1: REST API to easily mock realish invoices.
mockinvoice.expandedContent2: Supports these query parameters: paymentMethods, vendorName, accountNumber, numberOfItems, invoiceDate, dueDate, currency.
mockinvoice.expandedContent3: Made with Go, Gotenberg and Docker.

netsalarycalculator.title: BR Net Salary Calculator
netsalarycalculator.description: A tool to calculate the net salary of a Brazilian employee based on the gross salary.

writing.metaDescription: Thoughts on software engineering, product management, and personal growth. Includes both longer reflections and brief tech insights.
writing.ideasMetaDescription: Longer reflections on software engineering, product management, and personal growth. A personal exploration of the subjects I'm passionate about.
writing.bytesMetaDescription: Brief notes on code, tools, and tips. Quick insights from my daily tech encounters.
